member.name: T:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin
member.summary:
PushPin Class (ver. 1.00.00)
This class has a vector image of the pushpin. Orientation of this image is set to bottom-pinpoint, so its position is exactly same as its aim point. There are 3 variables; Color, Initial, Dot, so you can modify its style using those.
ROH Holding Company Won Dong (fkiller@gmail.com)

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin.#ctor
member.summary: PushPin() Constructor
member.remarks: Constructor without parametors. Its default style is yellow-backgrounded dot.

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin.#ctor(System.Char,System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: PushPin() Constructor
member.param: It indicates initial charactor of pushpin. If it's space ' ', then dot will be shown. If initial is char.MinValue, then nothing will be shown.
Location of pushpin. Its orientation is set to bottom-pinpoint, so its position is exactly same as its aim point.

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin.#ctor(System.Char,System.Windows.Point,System.Windows.Controls.Panel)
member.summary: PushPin() Constructor
member.remarks: Constructor with initial, location, and base panel.
member.param: It indicates initial charactor of pushpin. If it's space ' ', then dot will be shown. If initial is char.MinValue, then nothing will be shown.
Location of pushpin. Its orientation is set to bottom-pinpoint, so its position is exactly same as its aim point.
Panel that will be parent of this class.

member.summary: PushPin() Constructor
member.remarks: Constructor with initial, location, and base panel.
member.param: It indicates initial charactor of pushpin. If it's space ' ', then dot will be shown. If initial is char.MinValue, then nothing will be shown.

member.name: P:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.PushPin.Scale
member.summary: Property. Size of pushpin. Default value is 1.0 (Width:35, Height:63).

member.name: T:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.DeepZoomContainer
member.summary:
DeepZoomContainer class. (ver. 1.00.00)
It's encapsulated version of MultiScaleImage. It can contain UIElements such as pushpins, images, and paths. Like MultiScaleImage, it is ViewPoint-based, and every contained objects will move when viewpoint of MultiScaleImage changes.
ROH Holding Company Won Dong (fkiller@gmail.com)

member.name: F:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.DeepZoomContainer.WheelZoom
member.summary: Property. It allows wheel zooming.

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.DeepZoomContainer.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor. In default, MouseDrag, and WheelZoom is set to true.

member.name: M:ROH.Web.Client.Silverlight.DeepZoomContainer.Add(System.Double,System.Double,System.Windows.UIElement)
member.summary: Method that adds a UIElement onto MultiScaleImage.
member.param: X position on MultiScaleImage. 0 is left. 1.0 is right.
Y position on MultiScaleImage. 0 is top. 1.0 is bottom.

member.summary: Method that adds a pushpin onto MultiScaleImage.
member.param: X position on MultiScaleImage. 0 is left. 1.0 is right.
